text: Amnesty campaigns for internationally recognized human rights to be respected and protected. Join the movement on amnesty.fi
The Red Cross helps when a catastrophe or an accident occurs and trains people to be prepared. Donate on punainenristi.fi
UNICEF is the driving force that helps build a world where the rights of every child are realized. Set up a monthly gift on unicef.fi
Build a future in which humans live in harmony with nature. Join WWF on wwf.fi
Finn Church Aid carries out development cooperation, humanitarian assistance and advocacy work. Give your donation on kirkonulkomaanapu.fi
World Vision Finland works to create a lasting, positive change in the lives of families living in poverty. Read more on worldvision.fi
